subject: Stupid Radio Tricks-good refresher on oddities that must be separated from evp

http://www.stupidscannertricks.com/cgi-bin/sst/db.cgi?db=default&uid=default&view_records=1&ID=*&nh=1
   
  thinking back, most really good evp seem to come just before some SW band opens up.
   
  if by reflection via skywave, some rf is changed to some other polarization or coupling and it arrives first, that would help clarify whats really happening.
